providers.title: AI Providers
providers.securityDescription: Your API keys are stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers.
providers.ollamaHint: Make sure Ollama is running locally.
providers.customProviderDescription: Configure a custom OpenAI-compatible API provider.
providers.baseURLHint: The base URL for the API (e.g., https://api.example.com/v1)
providers.modelsHint: Click on a model to set it as default. Click the X to remove.
providers.ollamaNoModels: No models installed. Pull a model to get started.
providers.ollamaDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {model}? This action cannot be undone.

providers.togetheraiDescription: Fast inference for open source models
providers.cerebrasDescription: Fastest inference with custom AI chips

searchSettings.title: Web Search

searchSettings.maxResultsDescription: Number of search results to return
searchSettings.providersDescription: Configure API keys for different search providers
searchSettings.fallbackDescription: Automatically try next provider if primary fails

customInstructions.aboutYouHint: Share context about yourself for more relevant responses.
customInstructions.aboutYouPlaceholder: e.g., I'm a React developer who prefers concise explanations...
customInstructions.responseStyleHint: Specify preferred format, detail level, or style.
customInstructions.responseStylePlaceholder: e.g., Be direct. Use bullet points. Include code examples.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Use these shortcuts to navigate and work faster.

projects.editProjectDesc: Update your project settings and preferences.

presets.temperatureHint: Lower = more focused, Higher = more creative

contextSettings.description: Control dialogue context and memory activation

welcome.tryPrompts: Try these prompts to get started

chat.title: Chat Mode
chat.description: Have natural conversations with AI. Perfect for quick questions, brainstorming, and everyday assistance.

agent.title: Agent Mode
agent.description: AI agent with tool access for complex tasks. Execute code, analyze data, and build applications.

research.title: Research Mode
research.description: Deep web research with source citations. Search, analyze, and synthesize information from the web.

learning.title: Learning Mode
learning.description: Step-by-step guided learning using the Socratic Method. Build understanding through questioning, not direct answers.

conversation.title: Conversation
conversation.prompt: Let's have a conversation about something interesting.

codeHelp.prompt: Help me write a function that...

writing.prompt: Help me write a professional email about...

conceptExplore.title: Explore a Concept
conceptExplore.description: Understand a topic through guided questioning
conceptExplore.prompt: I want to understand the concept of...

problemSolving.title: Problem Solving
problemSolving.description: Work through a problem step by step
problemSolving.prompt: Help me understand how to solve...

deepUnderstanding.title: Deep Understanding
deepUnderstanding.prompt: I want to deeply understand why...

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Let's get you set up in just a few steps
onboarding.featureChatDesc: Natural conversations with advanced AI models
onboarding.featureAgentDesc: Execute code, analyze data, and automate tasks
onboarding.featureResearchDesc: Deep web research with source citations
onboarding.selectProviderDescription: Select a default AI provider to get started. You can add more providers later.
onboarding.configureApiKeyDescription: Enter your API key to start using this provider.
onboarding.configureOllamaDescription: Configure the Ollama server URL to use local models.
onboarding.ollamaHint: Make sure Ollama is running locally. Download from

onboarding.getTavilyKey: Get your free API key from
onboarding.searchOptionalHint: This step is optional. You can configure it later in Settings.
onboarding.mcpConfigDescription: Extend AI capabilities with Model Context Protocol servers.

onboarding.appearanceDescription: Choose your preferred theme and language.
onboarding.completeDescription: Your configuration is complete. You can always change these settings later.

chatSettings.defaultProviderDesc: Select the default AI provider for new conversations
chatSettings.configureProviderHint: Configure at least one provider in the Providers section first.
chatSettings.generationParamsDesc: Control AI response behavior and creativity
chatSettings.topPHint: Nucleus sampling: lower values make output more focused by considering fewer tokens.
chatSettings.frequencyPenaltyHint: Penalize tokens based on frequency. Positive values reduce word repetition.
chatSettings.presencePenaltyHint: Encourage exploring new topics. Positive values promote variety in responses.
chatSettings.autoGenerateTitlesDesc: Generate titles from the first message

mcpInstall.quickInstallDesc: Choose from popular MCP servers to quickly add to your setup.
mcpInstall.configureDesc: Configure the server settings before installation.
mcpInstall.addedSuccessfully: Your MCP server has been added successfully.
mcpInstall.additionalArgsHint: Space-separated additional arguments to pass to the server
mcpInstall.serverReady: The server has been configured and is ready to use.

agentMode.name: Name
agentMode.systemPromptPlaceholder: You are a helpful assistant that...

desktopSettings.title: Desktop Settings
desktopSettings.notAvailable: These settings are only available in the desktop app
desktopSettings.downloadHint: Download the desktop app to access native features like system notifications, global shortcuts, and automatic updates.
desktopSettings.enableNotificationsDesc: Receive desktop notifications for important events
desktopSettings.notificationsEnabledBody: You will now receive desktop notifications.
desktopSettings.testNotificationBody: This is a test notification from Cognia.
desktopSettings.updatesDesc: Check for and install app updates
desktopSettings.latestVersion: You are on the latest version

keyboardSettings.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardSettings.description: Customize shortcuts to match your workflow
keyboardSettings.customShortcutsAlert: You have {count} custom shortcut(s) configured. Custom shortcuts are highlighted with a colored border.
keyboardSettings.allShortcutsDesc: Click the edit button to customize any shortcut
keyboardSettings.tip1: Press / anywhere to focus the chat input
keyboardSettings.tip2: Use Ctrl+K to open the command palette
keyboardSettings.tip3: Press Esc to stop AI generation
keyboardSettings.resetConfirmDesc: This will restore all keyboard shortcuts to their default values. Your custom shortcuts will be removed.

speechSettings.sttDescription: Configure voice input settings for dictation
speechSettings.systemSpeechDesc: Uses browser's built-in speech recognition. Fast and free, but accuracy varies by browser.
speechSettings.whisperDesc: Uses OpenAI Whisper API for high-accuracy transcription. Requires API key.
speechSettings.continuousModeDesc: Keep listening after each phrase (vs stopping after silence)
speechSettings.autoSendDesc: Automatically send message after voice input stops
speechSettings.autoStopSilenceDesc: Automatically stop listening after a period of silence
speechSettings.ttsDescription: Configure voice output settings for AI responses
speechSettings.enableTtsDesc: Allow AI responses to be read aloud
speechSettings.browserSupportNote: Speech features depend on browser support. Chrome and Edge have the best support for speech recognition.

workflowEditor.dragToAdd: Drag nodes to add them to the canvas
workflowEditor.name: Name
workflowEditor.startNodeDescription: Configure the workflow inputs. These will be available to all subsequent nodes.
workflowEditor.endNodeDescription: Configure the workflow outputs. Map values from previous nodes to the final output.
workflowEditor.maxConcurrencyHint: Maximum number of branches to execute simultaneously
workflowEditor.parallelNodeHint: Connect multiple nodes to this parallel node to execute them concurrently.
workflowEditor.subworkflowHint: Configure input and output mappings in the Inputs and Outputs tabs.
workflowEditor.webhookHint: Configure headers and authentication in the advanced settings.
workflowEditor.mergeHint: Connect multiple branches to this node to merge their outputs.

learningMode.title: Learning Mode
learningMode.noActiveSession: No active learning session. Start one to begin guided learning.

startDialog.title: Start Learning Session
startDialog.description: Define what you want to learn. The AI mentor will guide you through step-by-step discovery using the Socratic method.
startDialog.topic: What do you want to learn?
startDialog.topicPlaceholder: e.g., How does recursion work in programming?
startDialog.backgroundPlaceholder: Describe your current understanding of this topic...
startDialog.goalHint: Press Enter to add a goal
